# ryx


ryx is a custom function defined in R that computes correlations between a specified dependent variable (y) and a set of independent variables (x) within a given dataset. The function is intended to analyze relationships and determine the strength and significance of correlations.

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Contributing](#contributing)
- [License](#license)

## Installation

devtools::install_github("github_username/ryx")

## Usage

This function computes correlation coefficients and their associated p-values
between a dependent variable and specified independent variables.
